post.description:
# Asset

Create an Asset (Vehicle)

## Input

| Parameter						| Type     | Description																					                              |
| ------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| AssetId         		| GUID     | ID of the Asset                                                                    |
| AssetName						| string   | Display name	(vehicle registration plate)                                          |
| AssetType 					| string   | Front Loader, Side Loader, Rear End Loader                                         |
| City          			| string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Street              | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Address1            | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Address2            | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Address3            | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| PostalCode          | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| HouseNumber         | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| OutletId            | GUID     | ID of the Company Outlet associated with the Asset                                 |
| IsDeleted						| bool     | Inactive    													                                              |

get.description:
# Contamination Event Changes

Retrieve changes in the list of Contamination Events for all tenants, that have been made since a specific point in the history

## Input

| Parameter               | Description                |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------- |
| since                   | Bookmark from extra.until  |
| cursor                  | Bookmark from extra.cursor |
| links                   | N/A                        |

## Output

| Property						| Type     | Description																					                              |
| ------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| GUID								| GUID     | ID of the Contamination Event.													                          	|
| TenantId						| GUID     | ID of the Tenant associated with the Contamination Event		                        |
| CompanyOutletId			| GUID     | ID of the Company Outlet associated with the Contamination Event                  	|
| CustomerSiteId			| GUID     | ID of the Customer Site associated with the Contamination Event                     |
| VehicleId						| GUID     | ID of the Vehicle associated with the Contamination Event				                  	|
| Latitude	   			  | double   | Location of the Contamination Event                                                |
| Longitude						| double   | Location of the Contamination Event                                                |
| Timestamp						| DateTime | Timestamp of the Contamination Event	                                              |
| ContaminationScore 	| int      | Degree of Contamination found                                                      |
| extra.until         | string   | Bookmark to put in as "since" later - appears when there are no more pages for now |
| link.next           | URI      | Link to follow to get next page with changes                                       |

# Device

Request a list of devices (e.g. DVR cameras) for all tenants, that has changed since ???

| Parameter               | Description             |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------|
| since                   | ???                     |
| cursor                  | ???                     |
| links                   | ???                     |

# Device

Request a list of devices (e.g. DVR cameras) for all tenants, or request a specific Device by its GUID.

| Property                | Description                                            |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| GUID                    | GUID associated to the Event.                          |
| ManufactureIdentifier   | [int] Device Foreign Id.                               |
| Description             | Device name                                            |
| DeviceTypeListItem.Guid | GUID of the Type of the Device -- See DeviceType API       |
| DeviceStatusListItem.Guid | GUID of the Status of the Device -- See DeviceStatus API       |

# Device

Request a list of devices (e.g. DVR cameras) for all tenants, or request a specific Device by its GUID.

| Property                | Description                                            |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| GUID                    | GUID associated to the Event.                          |
| ManufactureIdentifier   | [int] Device Foreign Id.                               |
| Description             | Device name                                            |
| DeviceTypeListItem.Guid | GUID of the Type of the Device -- See DeviceType API       |
| DeviceStatusListItem.Guid | GUID of the Status of the Device -- See DeviceStatus API       |

# Device Type

Request possible types a Device can have.

| Property                | Description                                   |
| ----------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| GUID                    | The GUID associated to the DeviceType         |
| Description             | The descriptive Name of the DeviceType        |

# Device Type

Request possible types a Device can have.

| Property                | Description                                   |
| ----------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| GUID                    | The GUID associated to the DeviceType         |
| Description             | The descriptive Name of the DeviceType        |

# Event

Request a list of Events for all tenants, that has changed since ???

| Parameter               | Description             |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------|
| since                   | ???                     |
| cursor                  | ???                     |
| links                   | ???                     |

# Event

Request a list of Events for all tenants, or request a specific Event by its GUID.

| Property                | Description                                             |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| GUID                    | GUID associated to the Event.                           |
| Timestamp               | Timestamp when the Event occurred.                      |
| GeoLat                  | Latitude of the GPS location where the Event occurred.  |
| GeoLon                  | Longitude of the GPS location where the Event occurred. |
| RelatedDeviceGuid       | GUID of the Device that recorded the Event.             |
| CustomAttributesJson    | Event Type dependent information.                       |
| EventTypeListItem.Guid          | GUID of the Type of Event.                          |
| EventTypeListItem.Description   | Descriptive Name of the Type of Event.              |
| VideoStatusListItem.Guid        | GUID of the Video Status of the Event.              |
| VideoStatusListItem.Description | Descriptive Name of the Video Status of the Event.  |

put.description:
# Event

Update an existing Event.

| Parameter               | Description                  |
| ----------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| id                      | GUID of the Event to Update. |

# Request

```
{
	"RelatedDeviceGuid": "GUID of the Device that recorded the Event",
	"EventTypeListItem": {
		"Guid": "GUID of Type of Event"
	},
	"Timestamp": "2022-01-01 00:00:00",
	"GeoLat": 0.0,
	"GeoLon": 0.0,
	"CustomAttributesJson": "Json As String",
	"VideoStatusListItem": {
        "Guid": "GUID of the Video Status of the Event"
    }
}
```

get.description:
# Event

Request a list of Events for all tenants, or request a specific Event by its GUID.

| Property                | Description                                             |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| GUID                    | GUID associated to the Event.                           |
| Timestamp               | Timestamp when the Event occurred.                      |
| GeoLat                  | Latitude of the GPS location where the Event occurred.  |
| GeoLon                  | Longitude of the GPS location where the Event occurred. |
| RelatedDeviceGuid       | GUID of the Device that recorded the Event.             |
| CustomAttributesJson    | Event Type dependent information.                       |
| EventTypeListItem.Guid          | GUID of the Type of Event.                          |
| EventTypeListItem.Description   | Descriptive Name of the Type of Event.              |
| VideoStatusListItem.Guid        | GUID of the Video Status of the Event.              |
| VideoStatusListItem.Description | Descriptive Name of the Video Status of the Event.  |

# Event Type

Request possible types an Event can have.

| Property                | Description                                  |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| GUID                    | The GUID associated to the EventType         |
| Description             | The descriptive Name of the EventType        |

# Event Type

Request possible types an Event can have.

| Property                | Description                                  |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| GUID                    | The GUID associated to the EventType         |
| Description             | The descriptive Name of the EventType        |

post.description:
# Outlet

Create an Outlet

## Input

| Parameter						| Type     | Description																					                              |
| ------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| OutletId         		| GUID     | ID of the Outlet                                                                   |
| OutletName					| string   | Display name                                                                       |
| IsDeleted						| bool     | Inactive    													                                              |

get.description:
# Contamination Event Changes

Retrieve changes in the list of Overfilled Container Events for all tenants, that have been made since a specific point in the history

## Input

| Parameter               | Description                |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------- |
| since                   | Bookmark from extra.until  |
| cursor                  | Bookmark from extra.cursor |
| links                   | N/A                        |

## Output

| Property						| Type     | Description																					                              |
| ------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| GUID								| GUID     | ID of the Overfilled Container Event.													                    |
| TenantId						| GUID     | ID of the Tenant associated with the Overfilled Container Event		                |
| CompanyOutletId			| GUID     | ID of the Company Outlet associated with the Overfilled Container Event            |
| CustomerSiteId			| GUID     | ID of the Customer Site associated with the Overfilled Container Event             |
| VehicleId						| GUID     | ID of the Vehicle associated with the Overfilled Container Event				            |
| Latitude	   			  | double   | Location of the Overfilled Container Event                                         |
| Longitude						| double   | Location of the Overfilled Container Event                                         |
| Timestamp						| DateTime | Timestamp of the Overfilled Container Event	                                      |
| ContaminationScore 	| int      | Degree of Overfilled Container found                                               |
| extra.until         | string   | Bookmark to put in as "since" later - appears when there are no more pages for now |
| link.next           | URI      | Link to follow to get next page with changes                                       |

post.description:
# Customer Site

Create a Customer Site

## Input

| Parameter						| Type     | Description																					                              |
| ------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| CustomerAddressId		| GUID     | ID of the Customer Site                                                            |
| Name								| string   | Display name													                                              |
| Country 						| string   | Address part                                                                       |
| City          			| string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Street              | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Address1            | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Address2            | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| Address3            | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| PostalCode          | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| HouseNumber         | string   | Address part                                                                       |
| OutletId            | GUID     | ID of the Company Outlet associated with the Customer Site                         |
| IsDeleted						| bool     | Inactive    													                                              |
